## Pull Request Checklist

**IMPORTANT:** Ensure you have checked all of the following before submitting your PR.

*   [ ] **Self-Review:** I have thoroughly reviewed my own code and addressed any potential issues.
*   [ ] **Branch:** My changes are based on the latest `main` branch.
*   [ ] **Tests:** All existing tests pass and new tests have been added for new functionality.
*   [ ] **Linting/Formatting:** My code adheres to the project's linting and formatting standards (Ruff, Black, isort).
*   [ ] **Documentation:** Code comments and relevant documentation (e.g., README updates, if applicable) are up-to-date.
*   [ ] **AI Agent Directives:** My changes are consistent with the AI Agent Directives outlined in `AGENTS.md`.

## Description

*   **What:** Briefly describe the changes introduced in this pull request.
*   **Why:** Explain the motivation behind these changes. What problem does it solve, or what feature does it add?
*   **Impact:** How do these changes affect the existing functionality or architecture?
